images.description: SDSS image of region near lenticular galaxy PGC 30508 and spiral galaxy PGC 3080163, which are listed as NGC 3232; also shown are the unrelated background galaxies PGC 30509 and PGC 1824965
SDSS image of lenticular galaxy PGC 30508 and spiral galaxy PGC 3080163, which are listed as NGC 3232
